dealmanager

Class DealManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • dealmanager.DealManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DealManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    TransactionManager is used to search, sort, save/load multiple PurchaseReceipts at a time.
    Version:
    1.0 11/4/18
    Author:
    Joseph Varilla
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:

        public PurchaseRecord remove(int theId)
        Removes a PurchaseReceipt from the Transaction Manager
        Parameters:
        theId - The id of the PurchaseReceipt to remove.
        Returns:
        Returns the PuchaseReceipt removed or null if it was not in the TransactionManager

        Saves the TransactionManager's contents into a serializable form
        Parameters:

        Returns:
